channel.title: No saving?!
channel.description:
I HATE asking for help. But I need it. While my server - Trail To Hell - is up, it has many "Could Not Save For ---" and then it disconnects the player.
WHY WON'T IT SAVE!
Someone give me the answer. I hate asking for help, but I need it...
Newb 2341 says "Yay..."

item.title: No saving?!
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Shizzle to the nizzle…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 27, 2007, 03:08:07 PM[/size][hr]Found out it also says [fatal] Exception…

item.description:

Wow… that’s really weird then… Sorry I can’t help :\

item.title: No saving?!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Do you have this in your client.java?

public void loadsave(){ if(PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(playerName)) { returnCode = 5; disconnected = true; println_debug(playerName+" is already online."); } else { if(loadGame(playerName, playerPass) == 1) { misc.println(playerName+" character file successfully loaded."); appendToLR(playerName+" character file successfully loaded."); misc.println(playerName+" successfully signed onto server."); appendToLR(playerName+" successfully signed onto server."); } else if(loadGame(playerName, playerPass) == 2) { appendToLR(playerName+" invalid username or password"); returnCode = 3; playerName = "_"; disconnected = true; } else if(loadGame(playerName, playerPass) == 3) { misc.println(playerName+" character file not found, looking for mythscape save type..."); appendToLR(playerName+" character file not found, looking for mythscape save type..."); secondaryload(); } else { appendToLR(playerName+" unknown error, disconnecting client, game will not be saved"); savefile = false; disconnected = true; } } }

Read full topic
